data.what_is: XMPie provides software solutions for variable data printing, integrated cross-media campaigns, web-to-print and marketing automation.
data.product_description: XMPie provides software solutions for variable data printing, integrated cross-media campaigns, web-to-print and marketing automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good for VDP not a webstore.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
XMPie is great for variable data and creating creative marketing.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
It is sold as having the ability to do e-commerce well. It is quite cumbersome and not easily intuitive.  The customer interface leaves something to be desired.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ease of creating variable data for print. The tool's functionality handles images and text better than other tools we have used.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: XMPie is great for variable data and creating creative marketing.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: It is sold as having the ability to do e-commerce well. It is quite cumbersome and not easily intuitive.  The customer interface leaves something to be desired.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Ease of creating variable data for print. The tool's functionality handles images and text better than other tools we have used.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Web To Print Service Out There
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
This platform has a ton of functionality. It is fairly easy to modify and is a great solution if you need to create web-to-print storefronts for your customers. There is a XMPie user group on google that is useful when you need questions answered with a big audience that is waiting and willing to help out.They are knowledgeable and are able to help out with most issues. There is a great marketing platform you can get with it as well called Circle. you can do multi-channel marketing campaigns with it.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
You do need someone who is knowledgeable with html, css and mySQL if you want to get pretty custom. Getting response from their support can sometimes be a lengthy process. As long as you don't need something fixed right away then their support is great.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Have someone who is dedicated to using it and building it out. Then have someone else who is trained so they can take over if anything goes wrong. The training for this is pretty robust. If you get someone knowledgeable enough and a go-getter then they will be able to do some pretty custom stuff. There is a xmpie user group on google that is quite useful as well for when you have questions.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a printing company so we build web-to-print storefronts for our customers so that they can re-order and order more of all their marketing collateral. This is great for franchises who want to make sure their branding is consistent across all locations.

review_question_answers.answer: This platform has a ton of functionality. It is fairly easy to modify and is a great solution if you need to create web-to-print storefronts for your customers. There is a XMPie user group on google that is useful when you need questions answered with a big audience that is waiting and willing to help out.They are knowledgeable and are able to help out with most issues. There is a great marketing platform you can get with it as well called Circle. you can do multi-channel marketing campaigns with it.

There is a xmpie user group on google that is quite useful as well for when you have questions.

review_question_answers.answer: We are a printing company so we build web-to-print storefronts for our customers so that they can re-order and order more of all their marketing collateral. This is great for franchises who want to make sure their branding is consistent across all locations.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
Lots of information  can be a little confusing  not uk based

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Am able to send out emails  over different  platforms so am able to maximise chances of more people joining the company. Saves time on sending and outsourcing different individual sites and platforms

initial_reviews.review_title: XMPie is an innovative web printing solution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
What I like the most about this software is that it has allowed us to efficiently enhance and improve all our printed and variable data communications. In addition, it provides us with fully flexible and advanced workflows. Another great advantage of this tool is that it allows you to plan, manage and administer different multichannel marketing campaigns.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
It has a fairly steep learning curve, its use requires advanced and technical knowledge. The technical support service is slow and their responses are imprecise.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
My recommendation to other users is that they take some training or course prior to using the software, so that they can become familiar with its characteristics and functionalities. I also suggest that users evaluate the different pricing plans so that they can purchase the one that best suits the requirements and needs of the organization.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our experience with this tool has been completely positive, since we implemented this software we have managed to significantly expand our market, we have also managed to increase our income and improve the relationship with our clients.

review_question_answers.answer: What I like the most about this software is that it has allowed us to efficiently enhance and improve all our printed and variable data communications. In addition, it provides us with fully flexible and advanced workflows. Another great advantage of this tool is that it allows you to plan, manage and administer different multichannel marketing campaigns.

I also suggest that users evaluate the different pricing plans so that they can purchase the one that best suits the requirements and needs of the organization.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our experience with this tool has been completely positive, since we implemented this software we have managed to significantly expand our market, we have also managed to increase our income and improve the relationship with our clients.

initial_reviews.review_title: I have 3 years work experience in XMPie and variable data print
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
User interface is very friendly and it works with PDF really well

What do you dislike about XMPie?
It will create output pdf very slowly if I use more pages.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
I do create variable data print documents.

review_question_answers.answer: User interface is very friendly and it works with PDF really well

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: It will create output pdf very slowly if I use more pages.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I do create variable data print documents.

initial_reviews.review_title: Print production tool that makes variable data easy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
It made my prepress job easier to complete. I was able to create templates with variable data connections.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
The learning curve was a little difficult. There were specific ways to complete an upload and if you miss one step the whole thing broke. There wasn't an easy way to determine where I went wrong.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Once you learn it it's a great tool. But it does take some training and support.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Allowing repeat clients to order templates, enter their information and submit to print without the back and forth of an email.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: It made my prepress job easier to complete. I was able to create templates with variable data connections.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: The learning curve was a little difficult. There were specific ways to complete an upload and if you miss one step the whole thing broke. There wasn't an easy way to determine where I went wrong.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
review_question_answers.answer: Once you learn it it's a great tool. But it does take some training and support.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Allowing repeat clients to order templates, enter their information and submit to print without the back and forth of an email.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
I really like that you can personalize your letters, brochures etc. What it is made for. I am really glad that it works with Adobe InDesign.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
Difficult to learn everything quickly. Can be hard to figure out problems.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
If you are looking to do personalization on a large scale, this is the program for you.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
The benefits are enormous. It allows us to make really personal letter, child packets and all of our promotional materials.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: I really like that you can personalize your letters, brochures etc. What it is made for. I am really glad that it works with Adobe InDesign.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about XMPie?
review_question_answers.answer: Difficult to learn everything quickly. Can be hard to figure out problems.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
review_question_answers.answer: If you are looking to do personalization on a large scale, this is the program for you.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The benefits are enormous. It allows us to make really personal letter, child packets and all of our promotional materials.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
Robust amount of features in the uPlan and uProduce product

What do you dislike about XMPie?
Customer service/technical suppirt is nearly impossible to get a hold of. Errors given do not have useful error codes (i.e. fatal generic error)

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Make sure you have enough time to dedicate to trouble shooting the numerous issues that are going to come up.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Large quantity variable data print files.

review_question_answers.answer: Large quantity variable data print files.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Web To Print Service Out There
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
This platform has a ton of functionality. It is fairly easy to modify and is a great solution if you need to create web-to-print storefronts for your customers. There is a XMPie user group on google that is useful when you need questions answered with a big audience that is waiting and willing to help out.They are knowledgeable and are able to help out with most issues. There is a great marketing platform you can get with it as well called Circle. you can do multi-channel marketing campaigns with it.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
You do need someone who is knowledgeable with html, css and mySQL if you want to get pretty custom. Getting response from their support can sometimes be a lengthy process. As long as you don't need something fixed right away then their support is great.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Have someone who is dedicated to using it and building it out. Then have someone else who is trained so they can take over if anything goes wrong. The training for this is pretty robust. If you get someone knowledgeable enough and a go-getter then they will be able to do some pretty custom stuff. There is a xmpie user group on google that is quite useful as well for when you have questions.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a printing company so we build web-to-print storefronts for our customers so that they can re-order and order more of all their marketing collateral. This is great for franchises who want to make sure their branding is consistent across all locations.

review_question_answers.answer: I do create variable data print documents.

all_reviews.review_title: Print production tool that makes variable data easy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
It made my prepress job easier to complete. I was able to create templates with variable data connections.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
The learning curve was a little difficult. There were specific ways to complete an upload and if you miss one step the whole thing broke. There wasn't an easy way to determine where I went wrong.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Once you learn it it's a great tool. But it does take some training and support.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Allowing repeat clients to order templates, enter their information and submit to print without the back and forth of an email.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
I really like that you can personalize your letters, brochures etc. What it is made for. I am really glad that it works with Adobe InDesign.

What do you dislike about XMPie?
Difficult to learn everything quickly. Can be hard to figure out problems.

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
If you are looking to do personalization on a large scale, this is the program for you.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
The benefits are enormous. It allows us to make really personal letter, child packets and all of our promotional materials.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about XMPie?
Robust amount of features in the uPlan and uProduce product

What do you dislike about XMPie?
Customer service/technical suppirt is nearly impossible to get a hold of. Errors given do not have useful error codes (i.e. fatal generic error)

Recommendations to others considering XMPie:
Make sure you have enough time to dedicate to trouble shooting the numerous issues that are going to come up.

What problems is XMPie solving and how is that benefiting you?
Large quantity variable data print files.
